definition[0]: a word or sound that is repeated as a prayer or to help people meditate
example[0]: He closed his eyes and began to recite a Buddhist mantra.
definition[1]: a word or phrase representing a rule or principle which someone often uses, but which other people often find annoying or boring
example[1]: The Treasury Secretary has stuck to his mantra that ‘a strong dollar is in America’s interest’.
definition[2]: a piece of holy writing in the Hindu religion
